text: Shah Hussain Murtazavi () is a politician and a journalist from Afghanistan. He is the deputy spokesman for President Ashraf Ghani and is one of the media activists. Shah Hussain Murtazavi has completed his higher education in the field of International relations. == References == Category:Living people Category:Hazara politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shah Hussain Murtazavi
